attributes.action: Compel the Speaker of the House of Commons, Michael Martin, to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin epitomises much of what the public find objectionable in the present expenses disgrace.  He is clearly unrepentant for his own excesses (which have been considerable) and has used his position to bully others who call for change.  He will not resign willingly and should be made to conform to the will of the people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
